hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple GS Boss Key Loop

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Heart Container#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Deku Stick#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Deku Stick#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found in #Goron City#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Heart Container#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Zora Tunic# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #2# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path of #hearts#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Lower Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #spider behind webs# in a grotto holds #a Bow#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Right Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #the Serenade of Water#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Mirror Shield#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot
